alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 04 at 1:02AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * WHAT...Surf of 9 to 12 feet. * WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands. * WHEN...through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor. Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebrea, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 101 AOAULI ASO TOFI AUKUSO 4 2022 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu Maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu maualuluga ma malolosi e 9 i le 12 futu. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasae o le atunuu. * TAIMI...Seia oo i le aoauli. * AAFIAGA...Tulaga Feololo. O le amalolosi le fafati o galu ma aave o le sami, e le saogalemu ai ona auau. E ono vaaia sologa i gataifale. O nisi o taimi, e maualuluga atu galu nai le maualuga sa fuafuaina, e ono faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti i uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O tagata tafafao i le matafaga, tagata auau, faapea le au faasee i galu fafati e tatau ona faautagiaina nei fautuage mai le Ofisa o Vaai Tau.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution.
